extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Apache Spark Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the installed Apache Spark version is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Apache Spark version affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Apache Spark
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to a secure version of Apache Spark to mitigate the vulnerability. Recommended versions are 3.1.3, 3.2.2, or 3.3.0 and later.
